name: Beat Zero
description:
A scrolling rhythm game where notes are coming from the sides and only the amount of pressed keys matters. Visuals are inspired by neon style and retro computers.

Made in Godot Engine.

Controls:

ActionKeysLeftA, S, DRightJ, K, LRetryEsc

Sample level song: The Calling by TheFatRat (ft. Laura Brehm)
